# AEAssessmentConfiguration.AutocorrectMode

**Structure**

The set of autocorrect features that you can enable during an assessment.

## Declaration

```swift
struct AutocorrectMode
```

## Overview

Use one or more of the autocorrect modes to set the [doc://com.apple.automaticassessmentconfiguration/documentation/AutomaticAssessmentConfiguration/AEAssessmentConfiguration/autocorrectMode-swift.property] property of an [doc://com.apple.automaticassessmentconfiguration/documentation/AutomaticAssessmentConfiguration/AEAssessmentConfiguration] instance. For example, you can enable both spelling and punctuation corrections by combining [doc://com.apple.automaticassessmentconfiguration/documentation/AutomaticAssessmentConfiguration/AEAssessmentConfiguration/AutocorrectMode-swift.struct/spelling] and [doc://com.apple.automaticassessmentconfiguration/documentation/AutomaticAssessmentConfiguration/AEAssessmentConfiguration/AutocorrectMode-swift.struct/punctuation]:



## Creating a mode

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a new mode instance.

## Modes

- **punctuation**: A mode in which autocorrect checks punctuation as the user types.
- **spelling**: A mode in which autocorrect checks for spelling as the user types.

## Allowing corrections

- **allowsSpellCheck**: A Boolean value that indicates whether to allow spell check during an assessment.
- **autocorrectMode**: A Boolean value that indicates whether to allow Autocorrect during an assessment.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SetAlgebra
